import React, { Component } from 'react'; import statsService from '../services/statsService'; class Stats extends React.Component { state = { products: [], } async componentDidMount() { const { data } = await statsService.getAllItems(); if (data.length > 0) this.setState({ products: data }); } render() { let { products } = this.state; return (

); } } export default Stats;
